org.project.service

Interface GestionClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GestionClientImpl

    @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public interface GestionClient
    Interface de gestion des clients et de leur comptes
    Author:
    Morane & Clothilde
